bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names wan dou ban chuang 豌豆斑瘡 , pea[size] macules sores. Pathological Condition identical with dou chuang 痘瘡 , smallpox sores. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 9: 夫熱病皰瘡 者，此由表虛裏實，熱氣盛則發瘡，重者周匝遍身。若瘡色赤、頭白、 則毒輕，色紫黑則毒重。其形如豌豆，故名豌豆瘡 , “Now, as far as heat diseases with blister sores are concerned, they result from outer depletion and inner repletion. When heat qi abounds it will effuse as sores. In severe cases they cover the entire body. When the color of the sores is red with a white head, then the poisoning is minor. When the color is crimson-red and black, then the poisoning is severe. Their shape is that of beans. Hence they are called ‘ pea sores ’”.
